name: configarr
tagline: A self-hosted tool for backing up and restoring app configurations
description: Configarr is a backup and restore configuration management tool for services like Sonarr, Radarr, and others. It helps automate config backups and restore processes across your deployment stack.

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Schedule regular configuration backups for Arr services. Never lose settings again

features.title: Easy Restoration
features.description: Restore configurations with a single command. Disaster recovery simplified

features.title: Multi
features.description: Works with Sonarr, Radarr, Lidarr, and more. Unified backup solution

features.title: Version Control
features.description: Track configuration changes over time. Roll back when needed

features.title: Cross
features.description: Deploy on any system running your Arr stack. Flexible deployment options

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep sensitive configuration data under your control. Enhanced security and privacy
